name: A Future Where You're Saved, Takemichi & Hina
text: 【CONT】 If you have 2 or more other 《Revenge》 characters, this card gets +2000 power. 【AUTO】 【CXCOMBO】 Resonate [Reveal 1 "Thanks for the Courage, Takemichi" in your hand] When "First Kiss" is placed on your climax area, if this card is in your center stage, and you have another 《Revenge》 character, you may pay the cost. If you do, look at up to 2 cards from the top of your deck, choose up to 2 "Clover Necklace" or 《Revenge》 characters from among them, reveal them to your opponent, put them into your hand, and put the rest into your waiting room.

name: Special Person, Hina
text: 【CONT】 If you have 4 or more 《Revenge》 characters, this card gets -1 level while in your hand. 【AUTO】 [Put 1 other 《Revenge》 character from your stage into your waiting room] When this card is placed on the stage from your hand, you may pay the cost. If you do, put the top card of your clock into your stock.
flavorText: You're able to break down crying for others. You can get so frustrated for them. That's who you are.

name: Thanks for the Courage, Takemichi
text: 【AUTO】 When this card is placed on the stage from your hand or by the 【CXCOMBO】 effect of "Thanks for the Courage, Takemichi", you may put the top card of your clock into your waiting room. 【AUTO】 【CXCOMBO】 [(2) Put 2 cards from your hand into your waiting room & Put this card into your memory] At the end of this card's attack, if "Time Leap" is in your climax area, and you have another "Trigger, Naoto", you may pay the cost. If you do, choose 1 character with "Takemichi(タケミチ)" in its card name in your waiting room, and put it on the stage position that this card was on.
flavorText: I'm finally going to get revenge on my life!

name: Special Person, Emma
text: 【AUTO】 When your climax is placed on your climax area, choose 1 of your characters, and that character gets the following ability until end of turn. "【AUTO】 When this card attacks, look at up to 2 cards from the top of your deck, choose 1 card from among them, put it on the top of your deck, and put the rest into your waiting room." 【ACT】 Brainstorm [(1) 【REST】 this card] Flip over 4 cards from the top of your deck, and put them into your waiting room. For each climax revealed among those cards, perform the following action. "Look at up to 3 cards from the top of your deck, choose up to 1 card from among them, put it into your hand, and put the rest into your waiting room."

name: Festival, Draken & Mikey
text: 【AUTO】 When this card is placed on the stage from your hand, all players perform the following action. "If your memory has 5 or more cards, choose 4 cards in your memory, and put all cards in your memory except those cards into your waiting room." 【AUTO】 [(1) Put 1 climax from your hand into your waiting room] When this card is placed on the stage from your hand, you may pay the cost. If you do, choose 1 climax in your waiting room, and return it to your hand.

name: Changing the Tides of Battle, Draken
text: 【AUTO】 When you use this card's "Backup", reveal the top card of your deck. If that card is a 《Revenge》 character, put it into your hand, choose 1 card in your hand, and put it into your waiting room. (Otherwise, return it to its original place) 【ACT】 【COUNTER】 Backup 2500, Level 2 [(1) Put this card from your hand into your waiting room] (Choose 1 of your characters that is being frontal attacked, and that character gets +2500 power until end of turn)
flavorText: I'm going to protect all of you.

name: No Matter How Many Times I Fail, Takemichi
text: 【CONT】 Assist All of your 《Revenge》 characters in front of this card get +2000 power and the following ability. "【AUTO】 [(1) Put 1 《Revenge》 character from your hand into your waiting room] When this card is frontal attacked, you may pay the cost. If you do, this card cannot become 【REVERSE】 until end of turn." 【AUTO】 When this card is placed on the stage from your hand, look at up to 3 cards from the top of your deck, put them on the top of your deck in any order, choose up to 1 of your opponent's characters, and return it to their hand.
flavorText: In the future... In the past... Always and forever... I've always loved you!

name: Kid's Meal, Mikey
text: 【AUTO】 When this card is placed on the stage from your hand, you may choose 1 《Revenge》 character in your waiting room, and put it face down underneath this card as a marker. 【AUTO】 [Put all markers underneath this card at the bottom of your deck in any order] When this card attacks, you may pay the cost. If you do, deal 1 damage X times to your opponent. X is equal to the number of markers put at the bottom of your deck for the cost of this ability. (Damage may be canceled) 【AUTO】 [(1)] At the beginning of the encore step, if you do not have another 【REST】 character in your center stage, you may pay the cost. If you do, 【REST】 this card.
flavorText: Way to go, Ken-chin!

name: Having It the Hardest, Mikey
text: 【AUTO】 When this card is placed on the stage from your hand, choose 1 of your opponent's characters, and that character gets the following ability until the end of your opponent's next turn. "【CONT】 This card cannot move to another position of the stage." 【AUTO】 When this card becomes 【REVERSE】, if this card's battle opponent is level 0 or lower, you may put that character into your opponent's stock. If you do, put the bottom card of your opponent's stock into their waiting room.
flavorText:
He promised me... that we'd rule the world together.
Don't make me worry like that, you asshole.

name: Hooked on the Occult, Naoto
text: 【AUTO】 When this card is placed on the stage from your hand, look at up to 2 cards from the top of your deck, and put them on the top of your deck in any order. 【AUTO】 When this card becomes 【REVERSE】 in battle, reveal the top card of your deck. If that card is level 1 or higher, you may put this card into your stock. (Climax are regarded as level 0. Return the revealed card to its original place)

name: Birthday Present, Emma & Draken
text: 【AUTO】 When this card is placed on the stage from your hand, all characters in your opponent's center stage get -500 power until end of turn. 【AUTO】 [(1) Put 1 card from your hand into your waiting room] When this card is placed on the stage from your hand, you may pay the cost. If you do, search your deck for up to 1 《Revenge》 character, reveal it to your opponent, put it into your hand, and shuffle your deck.
flavorText: Happy birthday.

name: You Always Turn Up Suddenly, Hina
text: 【CONT】 During your turn, all of your other characters get +500 power. 【ACT】 [【REST】 this card] If there are no markers underneath this card, choose 1 "Clover Necklace" or 《Revenge》 character in your waiting room, and put it face up underneath this card as a marker. 【ACT】 [(1) 【REST】 this card] Return 1 marker underneath this card to your hand.

name: Successful Surgery, Hina & Emma
text: 【AUTO】 When your climax is placed on your climax area, choose 1 of your 《Revenge》 characters, and that character gets +1500 power until end of turn. 【AUTO】 【CXCOMBO】 When "Hope It Goes Well" is placed on your climax area, put the top card of your deck into your waiting room. If that card is a 《Revenge》 character, choose 1 of your characters, and that character gets the following ability until end of turn. "【AUTO】 This ability activates up to 1 time per turn. When this card attacks, during that attack, perform a trigger check 2 times on the trigger step."

name: Half-Siblings, Emma & Mikey
text: 【AUTO】 [Put 1 card from your hand into your waiting room] When this card is placed on the stage from your hand, you may pay the cost. If you do, search your deck for up to 1 level 0 or lower character, put it on any position of your stage, and shuffle your deck.

name: Please Save Everyone, Akkun
text: 【AUTO】 When this card becomes 【REVERSE】 in battle, if you have 2 or less cards in your memory, you may put this card into your memory. 【AUTO】 When this card becomes 【REVERSE】, if the level of this card's battle opponent is higher than your opponent's level, you may put that character into your opponent's stock. If you do, put the bottom card of your opponent's stock into their waiting room.
flavorText: Please save everyone... Our crybaby hero.

name: Friends Starting Today, Takemichi & Mikey
text: 【CONT】 All of your other 《Revenge》 characters get +500 power. 【ACT】 [(1) 【REST】 this card] Choose 1 of your opponent's level 1 or higher characters, your opponent chooses 1 level X or lower character in their waiting room, and exchanges them. X is equal to the level of the character you chose -1.
flavorText: Are you... really in middle school?

name: Caring Towards Comrades, Akkun
text: 【CONT】 If "Thanks for the Courage, Takemichi" is in your clock, this card gets -1 level while in your hand. 【CONT】 If you have 2 or more other 《Revenge》 characters, this card gets +3000 power. 【CONT】 【CXCOMBO】 If "Mizo Middle Five" is in your climax area, this card is in your center stage, and you have 2 or more other 《Revenge》 characters, your other "Thanks for the Courage, Takemichi" and "Caring Towards Comrades, Akkun" and "Childhood Friend, Takuya" and "Preoccupied with Perversions, Makoto" and "Mood Maker, Yamagishi" in all of your zones get in the trigger icon.
flavorText: Dreams? Maybe becoming a hairstylist?

name: Trigger, Naoto
text: 【CONT】 Experience If the total level of the cards in your level is 3 or higher, all of your other 《Revenge》 characters get +X power. X is equal to that character's level ×500.
flavorText: You traveled through time!

name: Mood Maker, Yamagishi
text: 【AUTO】 When this card is placed on the stage from your hand, you may choose 1 card in your clock, and return it to your hand. If you do, choose 1 card in your hand, and put it into your clock. 【AUTO】 At the beginning of your opponent's attack phase, if there is a character facing this card, you may move this card to an open position of your center stage.
flavorText: You don't need to act like you're scared!

name: Shampoo Hat, Draken
text: 【AUTO】 When this card is placed on the stage from your hand, put the top 2 cards of your deck into your waiting room, and this card gets +X power until end of turn. X is equal to the number of 《Revenge》 characters among those cards ×1000. 【AUTO】 When this card attacks, choose 1 of your other 《Revenge》 characters, and that character gets +X power until end of turn. X is equal to the number of other 《Revenge》 characters you have ×500.
flavorText: Quit messing around in a public bath.

name: Childhood Friend, Takuya
flavorText: When I win, you better treat me to some gyudon.

name: Bathhouse Buddies, Mikey
text: 【AUTO】 When this card is placed on the stage from your hand, reveal the top card of your deck. If that card is a 《Revenge》 character, choose 1 character in your opponent's center stage, and that character gets -6000 power until end of turn. (Return the revealed card to its original place)
flavorText: Boo♡ !

name: Preoccupied with Perversions, Makoto
text: 【CONT】 During your turn, if there is a marker underneath this card, this card gets +4000 power and the following ability. "【AUTO】 [(1)] When this card attacks, you may pay the cost. If you do, during that attack, perform a trigger check 2 times on the trigger step." 【AUTO】 When this card is placed on the stage from your hand, you may choose 1 "Childhood Friend, Takuya" in your waiting room, and put it face up underneath this card as a marker.
flavorText: We're gonna go pick a fight!

name: Reason Behind His Maturity, Draken
text: 【CONT】 This card gets +1500 power for each character in your opponent's back stage.
flavorText: It's actually pretty cozy.

name: Cheerful Tone, Hina
text: 【AUTO】 Resonate [Reveal 1 "Thanks for the Courage, Takemichi" in your hand] At the beginning of your climax phase, you may pay the cost. If you do, this card gets +4000 power until end of turn.
flavorText: Bye-bye!

name: Hopeless Freeter, Takemichi
text: 【AUTO】 When this card is frontal attacked, put this card into your waiting room, and reveal the top card of your deck. If that card is a character, put it on the stage position that this card was on as the defending character. (Otherwise, return it to its original place)

name: Impatient to Be an Adult, Emma
text: 【AUTO】 When you use this card's "Backup", if you have a 《Revenge》 character, choose 1 of your characters in battle, and that character gets +1000 power until end of turn. 【ACT】 【COUNTER】 Backup 2500, Level 2 [(1) Put this card from your hand into your waiting room] (Choose 1 of your characters that is being frontal attacked, and that character gets +2500 power until the end of turn)
flavorText: No kissing.

name: Clover Necklace
text: Search your deck for up to 1 《Revenge》 character, reveal it to your opponent, put it into your hand, and shuffle your deck. Put this card into your memory.

name: First Kiss
text: 【CONT】 All of your characters get +1000 power and +1 soul. (【CHOICE】: When this card triggers, you may choose a character with 【SOUL】 in its trigger icon in your waiting room, and return it to your hand or put it into your stock)
flavorText: I gave it to you because you're that special to me.

name: Time Leap
text: 【CONT】 All of your characters get +1000 power and +1 soul. (【CHOICE】: When this card triggers, you may choose a character with 【SOUL】 in its trigger icon in your waiting room, and return it to your hand or put it into your stock)

name: Hope It Goes Well
text: 【CONT】 All of your characters get +1000 power and +1 soul. (【CHOICE】: When this card triggers, you may choose a character with 【SOUL】 in its trigger icon in your waiting room, and return it to your hand or put it into your stock)

name: Mizo Middle Five
text: 【CONT】 All of your characters get +1000 power and +1 soul. (【CHOICE】: When this card triggers, you may choose a character with 【SOUL】 in its trigger icon in your waiting room, and return it to your hand or put it into your stock)

name: Light of the 1st Division, Chifuyu
text: 【AUTO】 When this card is placed on the stage from your hand, this card gets +X power until end of turn. X is equal to the number of 《Revenge》 characters you have ×500. 【AUTO】 When this card's battle opponent becomes 【REVERSE】, choose 1 of your other 《Revenge》 characters, 【REST】 it, and move it to an open position of your back stage.
flavorText: Pleasure to have you onboard, partner!

name: Way of the Delinquent, Draken
text: 【CONT】 【CXCOMBO】 If "The "Heart" That Cares for Others" is in your climax area, this card in all of your zones gets in the trigger icon. 【CONT】 If your stock has 5 or less cards, this card gets +4000 power and "【AUTO】 Encore [Put 1 character from your hand into your waiting room]".

name: New Era for Delinquents, Mikey
text: 【AUTO】 When this card is placed on the stage from your hand, you may put the top card of your clock into your waiting room. 【AUTO】 【CXCOMBO】 Resonate [(3) Put 1 card from your hand into your waiting room & Reveal 1 "New Era for Delinquents, Mikey" in your hand] At the end of this card's attack, if "New Era for Delinquents" is in your climax area, you may pay the cost. If you do, look at up to 3 cards from the top of your opponent's deck, choose up to 3 characters with X or lower total power from among them, put them into their clock in any order, and put the rest into their waiting room. X is equal to the power of this card.
flavorText: What's so lame about that?

name: Everyday Lives, Mikey & Draken
text: 【AUTO】 When this card is placed on the stage from your hand, you may put the top card of your clock into your waiting room. 【AUTO】 [(3) Put 2 cards from your hand into your waiting room] When this card attacks, you may pay the cost. If you do, deal 2 damage to your opponent, choose up to 1 card in your opponent's waiting room, and put it on the top of their deck. (Damage may be canceled)

name: My Treasure, Baji
text: 【AUTO】 [(1)] During your opponent's turn, when this card becomes 【REVERSE】 in battle, you may pay the cost. If you do, 【REST】 this card, and at the beginning of your next encore step, put this card into your memory. 【ACT】 [(1) Put this card into your waiting room] Look at up to 4 cards from the top of your deck, choose up to 1 《Revenge》 character from among them, reveal it to your opponent, put it into your hand, and put the rest into your waiting room.

name: Older Brother Figure, Mitsuya
text: 【AUTO】 Resonate [Reveal 1 "New Era for Delinquents, Mikey" in your hand] At the beginning of your climax phase, you may pay the cost. If you do, choose up to 2 of your 《Revenge》 characters, and those characters get +500 power until end of turn. 【ACT】 Brainstorm [(1) 【REST】 this card] Flip over 4 cards from the top of your deck, and put them into your waiting room. For each climax revealed among those cards, choose up to 1 character in your waiting room, and return it to your hand.

name: Just a Scratch, Baji
text: 【AUTO】 When this card is placed on the stage from your hand, choose up to 1 of your opponent's characters, put it into their memory, and your opponent puts that character from their memory on any position of their stage. 【AUTO】 When this card becomes 【REVERSE】 in battle, you may reveal up to 3 cards from the top of your deck. If you revealed 1 or more cards, choose up to 1 《Revenge》 character from among them, put it into your hand, put the rest into your waiting room, choose 1 card in your hand, and put it into your waiting room.
flavorText: Take care of Mikey for me.

name: Draken & Mikey & Takemichi
text: 【AUTO】 [(1) Put 1 card from your hand into your waiting room] When this card is placed on the stage from your hand or put into your waiting room from the stage, you may pay the cost. If you do, choose 1 character in your waiting room, and return it to your hand.

name: Let's Split Halves, Baji & Chifuyu
text: 【AUTO】 When this card is placed on the stage from your hand, choose 1 of your other 《Revenge》 characters, and that character gets +1000 power until end of turn. 【AUTO】 [Return this card to your hand] When your climax is placed on your climax area, you may pay the cost. If you do, choose 1 of your characters, and that character gets +1 soul until end of turn.

name: See? There's No One! Mikey
text: 【CONT】 All of your characters get the following ability. "【CONT】 This card cannot side attack." 【AUTO】 When this card attacks, reveal the top of your deck. If that card is a 《Revenge》 character, all of your characters get +1500 power until end of turn. (Return the revealed card to its original place)
flavorText: Anyone scared because Pah's bud got beat up?

name: Commander, Mikey
text: 【AUTO】 [Put 2 cards from your hand into your waiting room] When you use this card's "Backup", you may pay the cost. If you do, choose 1 of your opponent's characters with level higher than your opponent's level, and put it into their memory. 【ACT】 【COUNTER】 Backup 1000, Level 1 [Put this card from your hand into your waiting room] (Choose 1 of your characters that is being frontal attacked, and that character gets +1000 power until end of turn)
flavorText: I'm out of dorayaki.

name: Can't Promise It, Chifuyu & Baji
text: 【CONT】 During your turn, this card gets +1000 power for each of your other 《Revenge》 characters. 【AUTO】 【CXCOMBO】 At the end of this card's attack, if "The First Person I Wanted to Follow" is in your climax area, reveal the top card of your deck. If that card is a 《Revenge》 character, put it into your hand. (Otherwise, return it to its original place)

name: Can't Hit Ya, Chifuyu
text: 【ACT】 【COUNTER】 Backup 3000, Level 2 [(1) Put this card from your hand into your memory] (Choose 1 of your characters that is being frontal attacked, and that character gets +3000 power until end of turn)
flavorText: Why are you in such a hurry, Baji-san?

name: I'm Never Going to Back Down! Takemichi
text: 【AUTO】 When this card attacks, this card gets +X power until end of turn. X is equal to the number of "Light of the 1st Division, Chifuyu" in your waiting room ×3000.

name: The Only Way is Attacking, Draken
text: 【CONT】 Memory If your memory has 2 or more "Becoming a Man That's Fitting, Takemichi", this card gets -1 level while in your hand. 【CONT】 If this card is in your center stage, all of your 《Revenge》 characters get +1500 power.
flavorText: Are you friggin' serious?

name: Unwavering Loyalty, Chifuyu
text: 【AUTO】 When this card is placed on the stage from your hand, draw up to 2 cards, choose 2 cards in your hand, put them into your waiting room, and put up to 1 card from the top of your deck into your stock. 【AUTO】 [(3)] When this card attacks, you may pay the cost. If you do, your opponent puts all of their stock into their waiting room, and puts the same number of cards from the top of their deck into their stock.

name: 5th Division Captain, Mucho
text: 【AUTO】 [Put 1 card from your hand into your waiting room] When this card is placed on the stage from your hand, you may pay the cost. If you do, reveal the top card of your deck, choose 1 level X or lower character in your waiting room, and return it to your hand. X is equal to the level of the revealed card. (Climax are regarded as level 0. Return the revealed card to its original place)

name: Becoming a Man That's Fitting, Takemichi
text: 【CONT】 If you have 1 or less other characters, this card gets +1 level and +2500 power. 【AUTO】 When this card becomes 【REVERSE】 in battle, if your memory has 2 or less cards, you may put this card into your memory.

name: Sin and Punishment, Hanma
text: 【CONT】 If your hand has 5 or more cards, this card gets +1 level, +1500 power, and the following ability. "【CONT】 This card and the character facing this card cannot side attack." 【AUTO】 At the beginning of your opponent's attack phase, you may move this card to an open position of your center stage with a character facing this card.
flavorText: Man, I'm tired.

name: 3rd Division Vice-Captain, Peh-yan
text: 【CONT】 All of your other "3rd Division Captain, Pah-chin" get +4000 power. 【AUTO】 [Return 2 《Revenge》 characters from your waiting room to your deck & Shuffle your deck] When this card is placed on the stage from your hand, you may pay the cost. If you do, choose 1 of your 《Revenge》 characters, and that character gets +2000 power until end of turn. 【ACT】 Brainstorm [(1)] Flip over 3 cards from the top of your deck, and put them into your waiting room. If "3rd Division Captain, Pah-chin" is revealed among those cards, choose 1 "3rd Division Captain, Pah-chin" in your waiting room, and put it on any position of your stage.

name: Most Important Thing, Baji
text: 【CONT】 If you have 1 or less other characters in your center stage, this card gets +4000 power. 【AUTO】 At the beginning of your attack phase, if this card is 【STAND】, and you have 1 or less other characters in your center stage, all characters in your center stage get the following ability until end of turn. "【AUTO】 When this card attacks, look at the top card of your deck, choose up to 1 《Revenge》 character from among them, reveal it to your opponent, put it into your hand, and put the rest into your waiting room."

name: Man Shrouded in Mystery, Kisaki
text: 【AUTO】 When your other 《Revenge》 character attacks, this card gets +1000 power until end of turn. 【AUTO】 [Put 1 other 《Revenge》 character from your stage into your waiting room] When this card attacks, you may pay the cost. If you do, reveal the top card of your deck. If that card is a 《Revenge》 character, put it into your hand. (Otherwise, return it to its original place)

name: Reason for Not Turning Back, Takemichi
text: 【CONT】 If the character facing this card is cost 0 or lower, this card gets +1 level and +3500 power. 【AUTO】 [Put this card into your waiting room] When your other 《Revenge》 character is frontal attacked, you may pay the cost. If you do, choose 1 of your characters in battle, and that character gets +2500 power until end of turn.
flavorText: I have a reason why... I can't turn back!

name: Last Wishes, Takemichi & Chifuyu
text: 【AUTO】 When your other 《Revenge》 character attacks, this card gets +X power until end of turn. X is equal to the number of other 《Revenge》 characters you have ×500. 【AUTO】 [(1)] At the beginning of the encore step, if you do not have another 【REST】 character in your center stage, you may pay the cost. If you do, 【REST】 this card.

name: No One's Losing, Mikey
text: 【CONT】 Your other character in the middle position of your center stage gets "【AUTO】 Encore [Put 1 character from your hand into your waiting room]". 【CONT】 Assist All of your level 3 or higher characters in front of this card get +2000 power.
flavorText: As long as I have its back, none of us are gonna lose.

name: 4th Division Captain, Smiley
text: 【CONT】 If you have 2 or more other 《Revenge》 characters, this card gets +3000 power. 【AUTO】 [(1)] When this card attacks, you may pay the cost. If you do, during that attack, perform a trigger check 2 times on the trigger step. 【AUTO】 Encore [Put 1 《Revenge》 character from your hand into your waiting room] (When this card is put into your waiting room from the stage, you may pay the cost. If you do, return this card to its previous stage position as 【REST】)

name: Strongest Man, Mikey
text: 【AUTO】 At the beginning of your climax phase, choose 1 of your 《Revenge》 characters, and that character gets +X power until end of turn. X is equal to that character's level ×1000. 【ACT】 [【REST】 this card] Choose 1 of your other characters, and that character gets +1 level until the end of your opponent's next turn.

name: Most Important Thing, Kazutora
text: 【AUTO】 When this card becomes 【REVERSE】 , if this card's battle opponent is level X or lower, you may 【REVERSE】 that character. X is equal to the number of "Most Important Thing, Kazutora" in your waiting room.
flavorText: But if you kill your enemy, you're a hero.

name: Revenge, Takemichi
text: 【AUTO】 When this card is placed on the stage from your hand, if your opponent has 1 or less characters in their center stage, you may choose 1 cost 0 or lower character in their center stage, and put it into their waiting room. 【AUTO】 [Put the top card of your deck into your clock] When this card is placed on the stage from your hand, you may pay the cost. If you do, put the top card of your deck into your stock.

name: 3rd Division Captain, Kisaki
text: 【ACT】 【CXCOMBO】 [(2) Put 1 other 《Revenge》 character from your stage into your waiting room] Choose 1 "My "Hero"" in your waiting room, and return it to your hand.

name: 2nd Division Captain, Mitsuya
text: 【AUTO】 [Put 1 《Revenge》 character from your hand into your waiting room] When your character's trigger check reveals a climax with in its trigger icon, you may pay the cost. If you do, choose 1 character in your waiting room, and return it to your hand. 【ACT】 [Put 1 card from your hand into your waiting room & 【REST】 2 of your characters] Choose in your waiting room, 1 character with the same card name as a character in your stage or your opponent's stage, and return it to your hand.

name: The Enemy In Front of You, Chifuyu
text: 【CONT】 If you have 1 or less other characters in your center stage, this card gets +4000 power. 【AUTO】 At the beginning of your attack phase, if this card is 【STAND】, and there are 1 or less other characters in your center stage, all of your characters in your center stage get the following ability until end of turn. "【AUTO】 When this card attacks, you may choose 1 《Revenge》 character in your waiting room, and put it into your stock."
flavorText: Just keep your eyes on the enemy right in front of you.

name: "Temporary" In-Charge, Hanma
text: 【CONT】 Assist All of your characters in front of this card get +500 power. 【AUTO】 [(1)] When your climax is placed on your climax area, you may pay the cost. If you do, put the top 2 cards of your deck into your waiting room, choose 1 level X or lower 《Revenge》 character in your waiting room, and return it to your hand. X is equal to the total level of those cards. (Climax are regarded as level 0)

name: The Heart Can't Keep Up, Mikey
text: 【AUTO】 When this card attacks, choose 1 of your characters, and that character gets +X power until end of turn. X is equal to the number of other 《Revenge》 characters you have ×500.

name: Handicrafts Club Leader, Mitsuya
text: 【ACT】 [【REST】 this card] Reveal the top card of your deck. If that card is a level X or lower character, put it into your hand. X is equal to the number of "Founding Member, Mitsuya" in your waiting room. (Otherwise, return it to its original place)

name: Concluding the Gamble on a Fight, Draken
text: 【AUTO】 At the beginning of your encore step, put this card at the bottom of your deck. 【AUTO】 Memory [(1) Put 1 card from your hand into your waiting room & Put this card into your waiting room] At the end of this card's attack, if "Becoming a Man That's Fitting, Takemichi" is in your memory, you may pay the cost. If you do, choose 1 "The Only Way is Attacking, Draken" in your waiting room, and put it on the stage position that this card was on as 【REST】.
flavorText: I'm bettin' a hundred mil on Takemitchy.

name: Allegiance Test, Baji
text: 【AUTO】 [Put 1 card from your hand into your waiting room] During your opponent's turn, when this card becomes 【REVERSE】 in battle, you may pay the cost. If you do, 【REST】 this card, and at the beginning of your next encore step, put this card into your waiting room. 【AUTO】 Resonate [Reveal 1 "New Era for Delinquents, Mikey" in your hand] At the beginning of your climax phase, you may pay the cost. If you do, this card gets +6000 power until end of turn.

name: Apologize Properly, Mitsuya
text: 【AUTO】 When this card is placed on the stage from your hand, put the top 2 cards of your deck into your waiting room, and deal X damage to your opponent. X is equal to the total number of in the trigger icons of those cards. (Damage may be canceled) 【AUTO】 【CXCOMBO】 When this card attacks, if "Captain of the Bodyguard Squad" is in your climax area, choose up to 1 card in your opponent's waiting room, put it on the top of their deck, and this card gets +6000 power until end of turn.
flavorText: The one who was thinking the most about Pah-chin was Draken.

name: Kick Like a Nuclear Warhead
text: Search your deck for up to 1 climax, reveal it to your opponent, put it into your hand, and shuffle your deck.

name: The "Heart" That Cares for Others
text: 【AUTO】When this card is placed on your climax area from your hand, perform the【STANDBY】effect. (【STANDBY】: When this card triggers, you may choose 1 character with a level equal to or less than your level +1 in your waiting room, and put it on any position of your stage as【REST】)

name: New Era for Delinquents
text: 【AUTO】When this card is placed on your climax area from your hand, perform the【STANDBY】effect. (【STANDBY】: When this card triggers, you may choose 1 character with a level equal to or less than your level +1 in your waiting room, and put it on any position of your stage as【REST】)

name: The First Person I Wanted to Follow
text: 【AUTO】 When this card is placed on your climax area from your hand, choose up to 1 character with in its trigger icon in your waiting room, return it to your hand, choose up to 2 of your characters, and those characters get +1 soul until end of turn.

name: My "Hero"
text: 【AUTO】When this card is placed on your climax area from your hand, perform the【STANDBY】effect. (【STANDBY】: When this card triggers, you may choose 1 character with a level equal to or less than your level +1 in your waiting room, and put it on any position of your stage as【REST】)
flavorText: See ya... My "hero".

name: Captain of the Bodyguard Squad
text: 【AUTO】 When this card is placed on your climax area from your hand, choose up to 1 character with in its trigger icon in your waiting room, return it to your hand, choose up to 2 of your characters, and those characters get +1 soul until end of turn.

name: Founding Member, Baji
text: 【AUTO】 When your climax is placed on your climax area, choose 1 of your characters, and that character gets the following ability until end of turn. "【AUTO】 When this card's battle opponent becomes 【REVERSE】, you may draw 1 card. If you do, choose 1 card in your hand, and put it into your waiting room." 【ACT】 Brainstorm [(1) 【REST】 this card] Flip over 4 cards from the top of your deck, and put them into your waiting room. For each climax revealed among those cards, search your deck for up to 1 《Revenge》 character, reveal it to your opponent, put it into your hand, and shuffle your deck.

name: Founding Member, Mitsuya
text: 【AUTO】 When this card is placed on the stage from your hand, this card gets +1500 power until end of turn. 【AUTO】 At the beginning of your opponent's draw phase, put the top 2 cards of your deck into your waiting room. If there is a level 2 or higher card among those cards, you may return this card to your hand. (Climax are regarded as level 0)

name: Founding Member, Kazutora
text: 【AUTO】 When this card is placed on the stage from your hand, this card gets +X power until end of turn. X is equal to the number of 《Revenge》 characters you have ×500. 【AUTO】 【CXCOMBO】 [Put 1 card from your hand into your waiting room] When this card attacks, if "I'll Forgive You" is in your climax area, and you have another 《Revenge》 character, you may pay the cost. If you do, look at up to 4 cards from the top of your deck, choose up to 2 "Amulet From "That Day"" or 《Revenge》 characters from among them, reveal them to your opponent, put them into your hand, and put the rest into your waiting room.

name: Bloody Halloween, Kazutora & Mikey
text: 【AUTO】 When this card is placed on the stage from your hand, reveal the top card of your deck. If that card is an event or a 《Revenge》 character, put it into your hand, choose 1 card in your hand, and put it into your waiting room. (Otherwise, return it to its original place) 【AUTO】 When this card is placed on the stage from your hand, if you have 2 or more other 《Revenge》 characters, you may draw 1 card. If you do, choose 1 card in your hand, and put it into your waiting room.

name: Draken & Mitsuya
text: 【CONT】 All of your other 《Revenge》 characters get +500 power. 【AUTO】 [Put 1 card from your hand into your waiting room] When your character's trigger check reveals a climax with in its trigger icon, you may pay the cost. If you do, look at up to 2 cards from the top of your deck, choose up to 1 card from among them, put it into your hand, and put the rest into your waiting room.

name: Founding Member, Mikey
text: 【AUTO】 When this card is placed on the stage from your hand, choose 1 of your 《Revenge》 characters, and that character gets +1500 power until end of turn. 【AUTO】 【CXCOMBO】 [Reveal 1 "Founding Member, Mikey" in your hand and put it into your stock & Put 1 "A Team Where Each Person Protects Everyone" from your climax area into your waiting room] At the beginning of your encore step, if this card is in your center stage, your hand has 5 or less cards, and all of your characters are 《Revenge》, you may pay the cost. If you do, look at up to 4 cards from the top of your deck, choose up to 4 《Revenge》 characters from among them, reveal them to your opponent, put them into your hand, and put the rest into your waiting room.
flavorText: I'm sorry you ended up getting hurt over that dumb thing.

name: Together 'Til the End, Baji & Kazutora
text: 【AUTO】 When this card attacks, if the character facing this card is level 3 or higher, this card gets +6000 power until end of turn.

name: Our Everything, Baji
text: 【AUTO】 [(1)] When this card is placed on the stage from your hand, you may pay the cost. If you do, choose 1 climax in your waiting room, and return it to your hand. 【AUTO】 【CXCOMBO】 [(8) Put 3 cards from your hand into your waiting room & Put 4 other characters from your stage face up in any order underneath this card as markers & Put 1 "We'll Entrust Our Everything to You" from your climax area into your waiting room] At the end of this card's attack, you may pay the cost. If you do, choose 1 "Kid's Meal, Mikey" in your waiting room, put it on the stage position that this card was on, and put this card and all markers underneath this card face up underneath that "Kid's Meal, Mikey" in any order as markers.

name: Bodyguard Squad, Mitsuya
text: 【AUTO】 [Put 1 card from your hand into your waiting room] At the beginning of your opponent's attack phase, you may pay the cost. If you do, choose 1 of your other characters, put it face up underneath this card as a marker, at the beginning of your next draw phase, choose 1 character from the markers underneath this card, and put it on any position of your stage. 【ACT】 [(1) 【REST】 this card] Reveal the top card of your deck. If that card has in its trigger icon, put it into your hand. (Otherwise, return it to its original place)

name: Seventh Elementary, Mikey
text: 【AUTO】 When this card is placed on the stage from your hand, this card gets +X power until end of turn. X is equal to the number of characters your opponent has ×1000. 【AUTO】 [Put 1 《Revenge》 character from your hand into your clock] When this card is placed on the stage from your hand, you may pay the cost. If you do, look at up to 5 cards from the top of your deck, choose up to 1 character from among them, reveal it to your opponent, put it into your hand, and put the rest into your waiting room.
flavorText: So what do some mama's boys who gotta gang up on others want with me?

name: Founding Member, Draken
text: 【AUTO】 Resonate [Put 1 card from your hand into your waiting room & Reveal 1 "Take Good Care of Her, Mikey" in your hand] When this card is placed on the stage from your hand, you may pay the cost. If you do, look at up to 4 cards from the top of your deck, choose up to 1 《Revenge》 character from among them, reveal it to your opponent, put it into your hand, and put the rest into your waiting room.

name: To Become a Hero, Kazutora
text: 【CONT】 If your waiting room has 2 or less climax, this card gets -1 level while in your hand. 【CONT】 This card gets +1000 power for each other 《Revenge》 character in your back stage. 【AUTO】 When this card is placed on the stage from your hand, if you have 2 or more other 《Revenge》 characters, this card gets the following ability until the end of your opponent's next turn. "【CONT】 The character facing this card gets -2 soul."

name: Race to the Shrine, Mikey
text: 【AUTO】 When this card is placed on the stage from your hand, look at the top card of your deck, and put it on the top or at the bottom of your deck. 【AUTO】 When damage dealt by this card is not canceled, this card gets +6000 power until end of turn.

name: Race to the Shrine, Kazutora
text: 【AUTO】 [(1)] When this card frontal attacks, you may pay the cost. If you do, choose 1 of your opponent's characters, and that character gets -1 level until end of turn. 【AUTO】 When this card becomes 【REVERSE】 in battle, if this card's battle opponent is level 0 or lower, you may put that character at the bottom of your opponent's deck.

name: Race to the Shrine, Mitsuya
text: 【AUTO】 When you use this card's "Backup", if you have a 《Revenge》 character, choose 1 of your characters in battle, and that character gets +1000 power until end of turn. 【ACT】 【COUNTER】 Backup 1000, Level 1 [Put this card from your hand into your waiting room] (Choose 1 of your characters that is being frontal attacked, and that character gets +1000 power until end of turn)
flavorText: Mine's the best in the world, my friend.

name: Founding Member, Pah-chin
text: 【AUTO】 When this card is placed on the stage from your hand, you may choose 1 card in your hand, and put it into your stock. 【AUTO】 When this card becomes 【REVERSE】, if this card's battle opponent is cost 0 or lower, you may put that character at the bottom of your opponent's deck.

name: King of the World, Mikey
text: 【CONT】 If your stock has 2 or less cards, this card cannot attack. 【AUTO】 When this card attacks, if the character facing this card is level 2, this card gets +6000 power until end of turn.

name: Race to the Shrine, Draken
text: 【CONT】 If your waiting room has 2 or less climax, this card gets -1 level while in your hand. 【AUTO】 When your climax is placed on your climax area, choose 1 of your characters, and that character gets +4000 power until the end of your opponent's next turn.
flavorText: Mine's the best in Japan, though.

name: Mumbling, Mikey
text: 【CONT】 This card gets +1000 power for each of your other 《Revenge》 characters. 【AUTO】 [(2) Put 1 "Founding Member, Mitsuya" from your hand into your waiting room] When this card becomes 【REVERSE】 in battle, you may pay the cost. If you do, 【REST】 this card, and 【REVERSE】 this card's battle opponent.

name: Amulet From "That Day"
text: Put the top 2 cards of your deck into your waiting room, choose up to 1 level X or lower 《Revenge》 character in your waiting room, and return it to your hand. X is equal to the total level of the cards put into your waiting room by this effect. (Climax are regarded as level 0)

name: I'll Forgive You
text: 【CONT】 All of your characters get +1000 power and +1 soul. (【GATE】: When this card triggers, you may choose 1 climax in your waiting room, and return it to your hand)

name: A Team Where Each Person Protects Everyone
text: 【CONT】 All of your characters get +1000 power and +1 soul. (【GATE】: When this card triggers, you may choose 1 climax in your waiting room, and return it to your hand)

name: We'll Entrust Our Everything to You
text: 【CONT】 All of your characters get +1000 power and +1 soul. (【GATE】: When this card triggers, you may choose 1 climax in your waiting room, and return it to your hand)

name: 1st Division Captain, Takemichi
text: 【AUTO】 [(1) Put 1 card from your hand into your waiting room] When this card is placed on the stage from your hand, you may pay the cost. If you do, look at up to 3 cards from the top of your deck, choose up to 1 card from among them, put it into your hand, and put the rest into your waiting room.

name: I'll Protect It, Chifuyu
text: 【CONT】 If you have another character with "Baji(場地)" in its card name, this card gets +3000 power.
flavorText: I've got your back!

name: Special Attack Unit, Baji
text: 【CONT】 If you have 1 or less other characters, this card gets +1500 power. 【CONT】 If you have 1 or less other characters, all of your other characters get +1500 power.

name: Childish Side, Mikey
text: 【AUTO】 When this card attacks, this card gets +X power until end of turn. X is equal to the number of characters your opponent has ×1000. 【AUTO】 [(1)] At the beginning of the encore step, if you do not have another 【REST】 character in your center stage, you may pay the cost. If you do, 【REST】 this card.

name: Vice-Commander, Draken
text: 【AUTO】 When this card attacks, choose 1 of your other 《Revenge》 characters, and that character gets +X power until end of turn. X is equal to the number of other 《Revenge》 characters you have ×500.

name: Bringing Everyone Together, Mitsuya
text: 【AUTO】 When this card attacks, if you have 4 or more other 《Revenge》 characters, choose 1 of your characters, and that character gets +2 soul until end of turn. 【ACT】 [(1)] This card gets +1 soul until end of turn.

name: Being Worn By the Clothes Instead, Takemichi
text: 【AUTO】 [Put this card into your waiting room] When your other 《Revenge》 character is frontal attacked, you may pay the cost. If you do, choose 1 of your characters in battle, and that character gets +1500 power until end of turn. 【AUTO】 When this card becomes 【REVERSE】, if this card's battle opponent is level 1 or lower, you may 【REVERSE】 that character.

name: Wrecked, Chifuyu
text: 【CONT】 All of your other "Race to the Shrine, Baji" get the following ability. "【AUTO】 [(1)] When this card attacks, you may pay the cost. If you do, during that attack, perform a trigger check 2 times on the trigger step." 【AUTO】 Bond/"Race to the Shrine, Baji" [(1)] (When this card is played and placed on the stage, you may pay the cost. If you do, choose 1 "Race to the Shrine, Baji" in your waiting room, and return it to your hand)
flavorText: Isn't Baji-san just awesome?

name: I'll Protect You, Hinata
text: 【AUTO】 [(1) Put the top card of your deck into your clock] When this card is placed on the stage from your hand, you may pay the cost. If you do, search your deck for up to 1 level 1 or lower character, reveal it to your opponent, put it into your hand, and shuffle your deck. 【AUTO】 [Return 2 characters from your waiting room to your deck & Shuffle your deck] When this card is placed on the stage from your hand, you may pay the cost. If you do, this card gets +2000 power until end of turn.

name: Fight Me One-On-One, Takemichi
text: 【CONT】 If you have 2 or more other 《Revenge》 characters, this card gets +1000 power. 【AUTO】 When this card's battle opponent becomes 【REVERSE】, if there is a climax in your climax area, you may put the top card of your deck into your stock.
flavorText: You wanna see something more entertaining, don't you?

name: Unfathomable Woman's Mind, Emma
text: 【AUTO】 When this card attacks, choose 1 of your other characters, and that character gets +X power until end of turn. X is equal to that character's soul ×1000.
flavorText: Heya, wussy boy.

name: Man of the Times, Takemichi
text: 【ACT】 【COUNTER】 Backup 2500, Level 1 [(1) Put this card from your hand into your waiting room] (Choose 1 of your characters that is being frontal attacked, and that character gets +2500 power until end of turn)
flavorText: How am I supposed to go back to the future now?

name: To Save His Sister, Naoto
text: 【ACT】 [【REST】 this card] Choose 1 of your 《Revenge》 characters, and that character gets +4500 power until end of turn.
flavorText: I may have become part of your powers.

name: First Time Using Polite Speech, Chifuyu
text: 【AUTO】 When this card is placed on the stage from your hand, this card gets +X power until end of turn. X is equal to the number of 《Revenge》 characters you have ×1000.

name: The Moment He Thought “I’m Dead”
text: 【COUNTER】 You may choose 2 cards in your hand, and put them into your waiting room. If you do, choose 1 character in battle, deal X damage to your opponent, and that character gets the following ability until end of turn. "【CONT】 This card cannot deal damage to a player." X is equal to that character's soul. (Damage may be canceled)

name: Promise to Take Over the World
text: 【CONT】 All of your characters get +1000 power and +1 soul. (: During this turn, when the next damage dealt by the attacking character that triggered this card is canceled, deal 1 damage to your opponent)

name: Gathering at Musashi Shrine
text: 【CONT】 All of your characters get +2 soul.

name: Commander's Right-Hand Man, Draken
text: 【AUTO】 When your climax is placed on your climax area, look at up to 2 cards from the top of your deck, and put them on the top of your deck in any order. 【ACT】 Brainstorm [(1) 【REST】 this card] Flip over 5 cards from the top of your deck, and put them into your waiting room. For each climax revealed among those cards, draw up to 1 card.

name: Everyone'll Understand, Mitsuya
text: 【CONT】 Assist All of your characters in front of this card get +500 power. 【ACT】 [【REST】 this card] Choose 1 of your 《Revenge》 characters, and that character gets +1000 power until end of turn.

name: Flag Wielder, Pah-chin
text: 【CONT】 If your stock has 2 or less cards, this card gets +1500 power. 【AUTO】 Resonate [(1) Reveal 1 "Take Good Care of Her, Mikey" in your hand] At the beginning of the encore step, you may pay the cost. If you do, 【REST】 this card.

name: Special Attack Unit, Kazutora
text: 【CONT】 You cannot play event cards or "Backup" from your hand.

name: Race to the Shrine, Baji
flavorText: The best in Tokyo!

name: Path Towards a Dream, Mikey
text: 【CONT】 This card gets +500 power for each of your other 《Revenge》 characters. 【AUTO】 When this card is placed on the stage from your hand, if you have 4 or more other 《Revenge》 characters, you may choose 1 《Revenge》 character in your waiting room, and put it into your stock.

name: 1st Division Captain, Baji
text: 【CONT】 This card gets +2500 power for each other 《Revenge》 character in your back stage.
flavorText: Bring it on, boys!

name: Changing the Tides of Battle Alone, Draken
text: 【AUTO】 When this card is placed on the stage from your hand, look at up to X cards from the top of your deck, choose up to 1 card from among them, put it into your hand, and put the rest into your waiting room. X is equal to the number of 《Revenge》 characters you have. 【AUTO】 [Put 2 cards from your hand into your waiting room] When this card attacks, you may pay the cost. If you do, put the top 7 cards of your deck into your waiting room, and deal X damage to your opponent. X is equal to the number of climax among those cards. (Damage may be canceled)

name: Take Good Care of Her, Mikey
text: 【AUTO】 [Put 1 《Revenge》 character from your hand into your waiting room] When this card is placed on the stage from your hand, you may pay the cost. If you do, return the top card of your clock to your hand. 【AUTO】 【CXCOMBO】 When this card attacks, if "You Should Come Along Too" is in your climax area, put the bottom 4 cards of your opponent's deck into their waiting room, and deal X damage to your opponent. X is equal to the number of climax among those cards. (Damage may be canceled)
flavorText: Like I'd ever hit a girl.

name: You Should Come Along Too
text: 【CONT】 All of your characters get +1000 power and +1 soul. (: When this card triggers, you may choose a climax in your waiting room, and return it to your hand)
